summary: Completed testing of new QIRLLO features: attendance tracking, school fees management, and bulk CSV upload. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend has some integration issues with attendance buttons and page routing.

ui_bugs.issue: Attendance marking buttons (Present/Absent/Late/Excused) are not clickable - appear disabled

integration_issues.issue: Page not loading at /admin/upload route - redirects to login
Page not loading at /parent/attendance-fees route - redirects to login

passed_tests: All backend APIs working (33/33 tests passed)
Teacher login and navigation to attendance page
Admin login and navigation to fees page
Admin fees page - record payment functionality working
Admin fees page - fee balances display correctly
Admin fees page - tabs switching (balances/payment history)
CSV template endpoint fixed (routing issue resolved)
Fee payment recording and balance calculation working
Attendance data loading and display working
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend issues: 1) Make attendance buttons clickable on teacher attendance page 2) Fix routing for bulk upload page (/admin/upload) and parent attendance-fees page (/parent/attendance-fees) - both redirect to login instead of loading properly 3) Check authentication/authorization for these protected routes
